message.entry: URL must be a string.
Channel ID must be a positive integer.
''Fields'' value must be a scalar or a 1-by-n numeric vector of positive integers with values between 1 and 8.
''Fields'' value must be a vector of unique integers.
Second argument must be a string representing a valid parameter name.
Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.
''ReadKey'' value must be a string.
''ReadKey'' value must not contain any spaces.
''NumPoints'' value must be a positive integer less than or equal to 8000.
''NumDays'' value must be a positive integer.
''NumMinutes'' value must be a positive integer.
''DateRange'' value must be a 1-by-2 vector of datetime values.
''DateRange'' value must have an end date and time later than the start date and time.
'Time zone of start datetime and end datetime must match.'
Invalid input combination. Specify either ''NumPoints'' or ''DateRange''
Invalid input combination. Specify either ''NumPoints'' or ''NumDays''.
Invalid input combination. Specify either ''NumPoints'' or ''NumMinutes''.
Invalid input combination. Specify either ''DateRange'' or ''NumDays''.
Invalid input combination. Specify either ''NumMinutes'' or ''NumDays''.
Invalid input combination. Specify either ''NumMinutes'' or ''DateRange''.
Invalid input combination. Specify either ''NumMinutes'' or ''NumDays''.
''Location'' value must be either 0 (false) or 1 (true)
''Timeout'' value has to be a finite number greater than 0'
''OutputFormat'' value must be either ''matrix'', ''table'' or ''timetable''.
Specified Field is not available on the channel. Refer to the FieldIDs in the channel information for valid field IDs.
Channel and field data missing from JSON. Ensure that the URL in the diagnostic information returns valid JSON.
Cannot parse channel information returned by ThingSpeak. Ensure that the server installation is working correctly.
Specify a valid read API key, or make the channel public to avoid specifying the read API key.
Connection to the ThingSpeak server has timed out. Specify a ''Timeout'' value to increase the read timeout period.
Unable to resolve hostname or IP address {0}. Specify a valid URL.
'Unable to read {0} points as requested. Only {1} points available in the channel.

Non-numeric data was found. This could mean that you are attempting to retrieve data from a channel or field that has non-numeric points. Set ''OutputFormat'' property to ''table'' or ''timetable'' to read non-numeric data.
Unable to find data. Specify data to write to fields using ''Values''.
Unable to write data to a channel. Specify ''WriteKey'' value as a string containing the write API Key.
''WriteKey'' value must be a string.
''WriteKey'' value must not contain any spaces.
Values provided as ''Timetable'' must contain time as datetime value.
No data provided to write to ThingSpeak. Specify either ''Values'' or ''Locations''.
Second input must be either a named parameter or data specified as numeric scalars or arrays or cell arrays or tables.
''Values'' must be a scalar, a 1-by-n numeric vector, or a cell array and must have the same dimensions as the ''Fields'' value.
''Values'' must have a maximum of 9 elements, including the timestamp.
''Values'' must have a maximum of 8 elements.
''Locations'' value must be specified as [latitude, longitude, altitude]. Specify latitude and longitude in degrees between [-90, 90] and altitude in meters.
Timestamps have been provided through two arguments. Use either ''Location'' or ''Timestamps'' to specify timestamps.
Timestamps have been provided through two arguments. Use either ''Location'' or ''Values'' to specify timestamps.
Timestamps have been provided through two arguments. Use either ''Values'' or ''Timestamps'' to specify timestamps.
''Timestamps'' value must contain Year, Day, Month, Hour, Minute, and Second.
Nonnumeric values or heterogeneous datatype vectors must be a cell array.
Number of columns in the table must be less than or equal to 8, or if the first column contains ''Timestamps'' value, the number of columns must be less than or equal to 9.
Number of columns in the timetable must be less than or equal to 8.
Data must be a 1-D cell array.
Data provided contains only NaN values.
''Values'' value must be an array or a table.
Number of columns in the array must be less than or equal to 8.
Number of columns in ''Values'' must be equal to the number of fields specified.
Number of elements in ''Timestamps'' value must be equal to the number of rows of ''Values'' value.
''TimeStamps'' value should contain a single column.
Timestamps for data values being written must be specified as datetime values. Use ''Timestamps'' to specify datetime values.
Missing timestamps. Either specify timestamps in the first column, or specify datetime values using ''Timestamps''.
''Locations'' value must be specified as [latitude, longitude, altitude]. Specify latitude and longitude in degrees between [-90, 90] and altitude in meters.
Timestamps have been provided through two arguments. Use either ''Location'' or ''Timestamps'' to specify timestamps.
''Locations'' value must have a maximum of three columns and the same number of rows as that of ''Values'' or ''Timestamps''.
''Locations'' value must have at least two columns specified as [latitude, longitude].
Server returned an invalid response.
Server returned an error. Check Channel ID, write API key and wait for 15 seconds between updates.
Unable to fulfill request. Make sure the ChannelID and the corresponding Write API Key are correct. If you just successfully wrote data to your channel, wait for 15 seconds before writing data again.
Incorrect write API key. Make sure the Channel ID and the corresponding write API key are correct.
Requests are too frequent. For further information, see Limitations in the documentation.
Unable to find resource. Check the URL, channel ID and write API key.
URL is incorrectly formed, or the requested feature is not supported in this version of ThingSpeak.
